statements: SELECT * FROM email_marketing_data;
SELECT email_id, email_content FROM email_marketing_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_data WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails_sent FROM email_marketing_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_emails_sent > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM email_marketing_data ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_data WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT email_content FROM email_marketing_data WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, send_date FROM email_marketing_data WHERE email_content LIKE '%promotion%';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM email_marketing_data WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails_sent FROM email_marketing_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_emails_sent > 5;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_data;
SELECT email_id, email_address, email_sent_date FROM email_marketing_data WHERE email_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_campaign_id FROM email_marketing_data WHERE email_sent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM crm_system WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email_address, email_sent_date FROM email_marketing_data ORDER BY email_sent_date DESC;
SELECT email_address, email_sent_date FROM email_marketing_data ORDER BY email_sent_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, email_campaign_id FROM email_marketing_data WHERE email_campaign_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address, phone_number FROM crm_system WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email_address, email_sent_date FROM email_marketing_data WHERE email_sent_date >= '2022-01-01' AND email_sent_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT email_address, first_name, last_name FROM email_marketing_data emd INNER JOIN crm_system cs ON emd.customer_id = cs.customer_id ORDER BY email_sent_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, subscription_date FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT last_name, first_name, email_address FROM email_subscribers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_contacts WHERE job_title LIKE 'Manager%';
SELECT contact_id, company_name, email_address FROM crm_contacts WHERE contact_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT first_name, email_address FROM email_subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM crm_contacts WHERE job_title = 'Manager' AND company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name FROM crm_contacts WHERE contact_id < 100 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT c.contact_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, e.email_address FROM crm_contacts c INNER JOIN email_subscribers e ON c.email_address = e.email_address;
SELECT * FROM EmailMarketingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailMarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, successful_deliveries FROM EmailMarketingCampaigns WHERE successful_deliveries > 50;
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM CRMContacts WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, total_opens, conversion_rate FROM CampaignAnalytics ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailMarketingCampaigns WHERE total_recipients > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, company_name FROM CRMContacts WHERE company_name = 'ACME Corp';
SELECT campaign_id, response_type, response_date FROM CampaignResponses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_opens, conversion_rate FROM EmailMarketingCampaigns INNER JOIN CampaignAnalytics ON EmailMarketingCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignAnalytics.campaign_id;
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM CRMContacts WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Newsletter';
SELECT * FROM EmailLists ORDER BY list_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Contacts WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(contact_id) FROM CampaignContacts GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Promotional';

SELECT Contacts.first_name, Contacts.last_name, EmailLists.list_name FROM Contacts JOIN CampaignContacts ON Contacts.contact_id = CampaignContacts.contact_id JOIN EmailLists ON CampaignContacts.campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(contact_id) AS total_contacts FROM EmailCampaigns JOIN CampaignContacts ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignContacts.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;

SELECT EmailCampaigns.campaign_name, ContactInteractions.interaction_type, ContactInteractions.interaction_date FROM EmailCampaigns JOIN CampaignContacts ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignContacts.campaign_id JOIN ContactInteractions ON CampaignContacts.contact_id = ContactInteractions.contact_id WHERE ContactInteractions.interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
